name: Signed in Ink
description:
This is a short game where you play as a Judge in a real life court case; Alexander v. Take-Two Interactive Software. 

This was created for Bradley University's IM450 - Copyright Law and Infringement class. 

Credits:

Emily Allar - Character Design/Animation

Haley Hutchings - Script Writing/UI

Kailie Otto - Asset Design/Animation

Kimberly McDaniel - Backgrounds/Compositer/UI

Anthony Pollos - Script Writing/Programming

Music Provided by: Brylie Christopher Oxley on freesounds.org

Special Thanks - Kyle Grenier
